column5: Happy Canada Day to all my fellow Canadians!  There's a lot of noise made on a few political threads here (and I concede that I make a disproportionate amount of the noise!), but those are few and far between. What I mostly see here is a bunch of people united by our passion for fishing and our love for this land. I'm thankful to be a Canadian today. This is a special country.  Have a great day everyone.  Dutch
Can't cut the dead grass/weeds because it's raining, should have gone fishin'.

Can't cut the dead grass/weeds because it's raining, should have gone fishin'.     It would be a race between me and the rain right now...Oh well...there is always tomorrow (maybe, at my age (80))  Happy Canada Day !
Is that politically correct to say?  Have a good'un folks.
Yes indeed! What a country we have here and how fortunate we are!!
HAPPY BIRTHDAY CANADA !! THE GREATEST COUNTRY IN THE WORLD !!!!!
Can't cut the dead grass/weeds because it's raining, should have gone fishin'.     TISK TISK.  GREAT COUNTRY YES WE HAVE.
Happy Canada day to all of my friends up North.   Art

Canada day had always been special for our family, arrived July 1 1960. I fly the flag proudly! had to correct my neigbour (older gentleman of Italian origin) about flying the flag upside down It was down in minutes and fixed! I've been around and comI g home is always special.
Where else could you find such a quiet and serene place as this so close to the city?
God bless Canada!  I know it's Euro soccer,but for you guys flying your flags off your cars why don't you leave and go back if you're so proud and patriotic
Here's to the Army and Navy and the battles they have won; here's to Canada's colours, the colours that never run. May the tails of the beaver never lose it's paddle!!!
